name: Pastry Skies
description:
Captain! The king requires additional donuts for his pastry party. Head to the Pastry Skies now and collect as many as you can! Be wary of cannon balls, the rivaling kingdom wants to horde those pastries for themselves!

This game was created for the Mini Jam 56 game jam in 72 hours.

Controls:
W/S to Move
Mouse for Buttons

Music: "Glitter Blast" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
